content.prompt: The first paragraph most directly illustrates how increasing regional interactions led to which of the following developments in the Indian Ocean in the period 1200â€“1450?

choices.label: The establishment of diasporic merchant communities
The establishment of new trading cities
The introduction of new cultural traditions
The emergence of syncretic belief systems

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
